monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Acid Hurricane
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Aeons
skills.description: At the start of the turn, heal 3% of this Monster's Max HP for every Age stack. (Capped at 7 stacks)

skills.name: Age of Purification
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an ally gets an Age stack, remove a harmful Stack from all allies. (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Broken Immunity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break on enemies also increases chances to apply Debuffs on them by 20%.

skills.name: Bubble Burst
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Curse Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects and effects of negative stacks are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Disarming Shielding
skills.description: For every shield applied there is a 10% chance to apply Armor Break, Weakness or Chill to a random enemy.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Preemptive Shield
skills.description: Aura: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 75% of this Monster's Defense value to the whole party.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Regeneration Shield
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also shields the Monster by 7.5% of its Max Health at the start of turn.

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Restoring Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (50 + 15% Defense) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (60 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (75 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (100 + 15% Defense) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield target for 7 x (125 + 15% Defense) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shared Regeneration
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Regeneration (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Regeneration.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime-ageddon
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison & Weakness (Debuffs)

skills.name: Toxic Support
skills.description: Every heal applied by this monster has a 10% chance to apply Poison to a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Poison.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Weapon Break
skills.description: Unique Aura: Enemies with Armor Break (Debuff) get their Critical Chance decreased by 10%.
